title: Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games
text: > Pennsylvania Column: Olympic athletes need to think beyond Rio Games FILE - In this July 26, 2012, file photo, U.S. swimmer Michael Phelps speaks during a press conference at the 2012 Olympics in London. Maybe itâ€™s not a surprise that Phelps, the winningest athlete in Olympic history, kept running into trouble away from the pool after some of his biggest triumphs. Turns out, dealing with the rest of your life can be even tougher than winning a gold medal. (AP Photo/Ng Han Guan, File)
